Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price. Given its value to you, I believe this opportunity would be highly beneficial. I am extending a special offer to purchase the product for $12,000. This price reflects a fair compromise between its intrinsic value and your perceived worth, while also ensuring a reasonable profit for me. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually satisfactory agreement. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
